channel.title: Welcome to Carloop
channel.description:
Congratulations on joining the Carloop community!
You are at the right place if you want to make apps for your car, using OBD signals, GPS and the power of the [Particle platform](https://particle.io).
You're welcome here whether you're a web programmer, an embedded pro, a car enthusiast or someone just curious to learn about connected cars.
Go to https://carloop.io to get your own Carloop device and come back here to exchange ideas on what you an do with it.
If you're curious about on-board diagnostics (OBD) or CAN, go ahead an ask a question. We'll be happy to answer.

item.title: Welcome to Carloop
item.dc:creator: jvanier
item.description:
Congratulations on joining the Carloop community!

You are at the right place if you want to make apps for your car, using OBD signals, GPS and the power of the Particle platform.

You’re welcome here whether you’re a web programmer, an embedded pro, a car enthusiast or someone just curious to learn about connected cars.

Go to https://carloop.io to get your own Carloop device and come back here to exchange ideas on what you an do with it.

If you’re curious about on-board diagnostics (OBD) or CAN, go ahead an ask a question. We’ll be happy to answer.
